pullrequest.title: Make expand items in Palette easier.

content.raw:
Yes! I am sorry I forgot to add the addressing issue. 

Actually the items could be expanded with a double mouse click. 
Nevertheless I think the goal of this issue is to expand the items on a single mouse click, same as in the gazebo main Interface.
content.html:
Yes! I am sorry I forgot to add the addressing issue.

Actually the items could be expanded with a double mouse click. Nevertheless I think the goal of this issue is to expand the items on a single mouse click, same as in the gazebo main Interface.
